detailedRequirements:
Resources Provided:

- Latest theme and plugin available on github https://github.com/topcoderinc/tc-site/tree/dev
- Data is avaiable on https://github.com/topcoderinc/tc-site-data

Challenge Overview

Main goal of this challenge is to customize sidebar of generic pages, so admin would be easy to assign few widgets to specified pages. The current sidebar within the WP templates is very rigid and we'd like to have more control over what can be shown within the sidebar area.

 

 

Namely:

  1. The template uses a tagging process to populate the "Related Content" area. We want to be able to populat that section with whatever we want. For example, I may want to add a page from the Help Center or Appirio. Currently, we can't do that.
  2. We want control over which sidebar elements we show on any given page. For example, on some pages I may only want to show "related content" and on others I may only want to show a quote and the most recent challenges. Right now, we can only show all three or none at all. see http://www.topcoder.com/community/getting-started/, http://www.topcoder.com/research/ 
  3. It would also be great to have the ability to create new sidebar elements using widgets, but if we're not set up for that right now, let's stick with #1 and #2 above.
  4. Please create new template instead of editing current template. we'll just need to swap template later

 

Additional Notes :

  1. Please be sure this update does not break any existing functionality

Quick Installation guide (also follow  this instruction):

  1. Activate theme and plugin
  2. Import provided XML file
  3. Set home as front page
  4. Set permalink to %post_name%
  5. Please install site on local.topcoder.com (add to hosts file), so your local site can read tcsso and tcjwt cookie
  6. Please login using social login to get tcjwt cookie
  7. Don't forget to set API server on TC API plugin option. you can set http:// instead of https://
